lc2h.config.title: 《▓ LC²H | Lost Cities Multithreaded ▓》
lc2h.config.header.subline: Multithreading-Engine für The Lost Cities. Entwickelt für beste Performance. Unterstützt durch die Quantified API
lc2h.config.subtitle: Beinhaltet Fehlerbehebungen, allgemeine Verbesserungen und... ENTEN :DDD. Rot markierte Felder erfordern einen Server-/Client-Neustart.
lc2h.config.option.async_double_block_ba: Use async batching for double blocks.
lc2h.config.option.floating_vegetation_r: Remove floating vegetation artifacts after terrain generation.
lc2h.config.option.explosion_debris.desc: Allow Lost Cities explosions to scatter rubble into adjacent chunks (can add clutter around streets).
lc2h.config.option.lostcities_gen_lock.d: Reduziert seltene Lost Cities Chunk Generierungsfehler (doppelte/fehlerhafte Chunks). Lassen Sie dies AN, außer Sie führen eine Fehlerdiagnose durch.
lc2h.config.option.cache_enforce_combine: If enabled, evict from the largest cache when combined usage exceeds the cap.
lc2h.config.option.cache_split_equal.des: If enabled, splits the combined cap evenly between LC2H and Lost Cities.
lc2h.config.option.cache_combined_max_mb: Maximum combined Lost Cities + LC2H cache memory before eviction.
lc2h.config.option.cache_lc2h_max_mb.des: Maximum LC2H cache memory (if split is enabled, this is a soft max).
lc2h.config.option.cache_lostcities_max_: Maximum Lost Cities cache memory (if split is enabled, this is a soft max).
lc2h.config.option.cache_lostcities_ttl_: Time-to-live for Lost Cities cached data in RAM.
lc2h.config.option.cache_lostcities_disk: Time-to-live for Lost Cities cached data on disk.
lc2h.config.option.cache_stats_logging.d: Periodically log cache memory usage and hit/miss stats.
lc2h.config.option.hide_experimental_war: Hide the experimental features warning banner.
lc2h.config.option.debug_logging.title: Debug Logging
lc2h.config.option.debug_logging.desc: Enable extra debug logging (can be noisy).
lc2h.config.option.ui_accent_color.title: UI Accent Color (Hex)
lc2h.config.option.ui_accent_color.desc: Accent color for the LC2H config UI (hex, example: 3A86FF).
lc2h.config.option.city_blend_enabled.de: Blend city edges into surrounding terrain to reduce harsh borders.
lc2h.config.option.city_blend_clear_tree: Clear trees near the city border for a cleaner transition.
lc2h.config.option.city_blend_width.desc: How far (in blocks) the city edge blend extends into the wilderness.
lc2h.config.option.city_blend_softness.d: Higher values make the blend smoother but wider.
lc2h.config.option.benchmark.title: Automated Throughput Trial
lc2h.config.option.benchmark.desc: Run an automated benchmark to validate worldgen performance on your hardware.
lc2h.config.button.language.tooltip.none: No other LC2H translations are available yet.
lc2h.config.modal.restart_required.title: Restart Required
lc2h.config.modal.server_restart_require: Stopping the server will disconnect everyone. Save all progress and be ready to manually start the server again.
lc2h.config.modal.restart_required.summa: Server restart required for these changes.
%s needs a server restart to apply.
One or more changes need a restart to fully apply.
%s needs a restart to fully apply.
lc2h.config.modal.restart_required.warni: You can close now, or keep playing and restart later. Some settings may not fully apply until restart.
lc2h.config.modal.cache_budget.title: Cache Budget Warning
lc2h.config.modal.cache_budget.warning: This can increase RAM usage and cause instability on low-memory systems.
lc2h.config.modal.unsaved.title: Hold on!
lc2h.config.modal.unsaved.summary: Looks like you’ve made some changes that aren’t saved yet. Want to save them before moving on?
lc2h.config.status.need_world_for_benchm: You need to be in a world to run the benchmark.
lc2h.config.status.opened_config_file: Opened config file in system editor
lc2h.config.status.sent_config_to_server: Sent config changes to server (OP only).
lc2h.config.status.failed_send_config_to: Failed to send config to server. Ensure config sync is reachable.
lc2h.config.status.saved_restart_require: Saved. One or more changes require a server restart to take effect.
lc2h.command.stats.title: LC2H Stats
lc2h.command.stats.body.view_culling: total=%s plannerQ=%s plannerBatch=%s multiChunk=%s warmupQ=%s warmupBatch=%s apply=%s
lc2h.command.chunkinfo.title: LC2H chunkinfo for %s
lc2h.dev.cache.cleared_disk_with_distrib: Cleared disk cache: flushed %s local, %s distributed
lc2h.dev.chunk_debug.enabled: Chunk debug enabled. Use a stick: right click to set start, left click to set end.
lc2h.dev.chunk_debug.primary_set: Chunk debug primary set to chunk %s, %s.
lc2h.dev.chunk_debug.secondary_set: Chunk debug secondary set to chunk %s, %s.
lc2h.dev.frustum_debug.enabled: Frustum debug enabled. Yellow=POV priority, Blue=background.
lc2h.benchmark.not_supported_dedicated: Benchmark not supported on dedicated servers.
lc2h.benchmark.join_singleplayer: Join a singleplayer world before starting the benchmark.
lc2h.benchmark.countdown_full: Benchmark will start in %ss. Press ESC to cancel.
lc2h.benchmark.starting_soon: Benchmark starting soon. Do not touch controls.
lc2h.benchmark.upload_saved_file: Results saved to file (website upload disabled)
lc2h.benchmark.chat.cpm_calc_chunks_load: - Chunks Loaded: Number of chunks that reached FULL status during the 60-second run.
lc2h.benchmark.chat.cpm_calc_real_time: - Real Time: Actual elapsed time (accounts for freezes/lag).
lc2h.benchmark.chat.freeze_detection: Freeze Detection: Any tick lasting 3+ seconds is counted as a freeze.
lc2h.benchmark.chat.freeze_example: Example: 5-second lag spike = 1 freeze (penalizes score by 5000 points).
lc2h.benchmark.chat.tip: Higher CPM + Fewer Freezes = Better worldgen performance!
lc2h.benchmark.results.title: LC2H Benchmark Results
lc2h.benchmark.results.clipboard.title: LC2H Benchmark Result
